column1: Kata Robata////Probably one of the best restaurants in Houston overall
column2: simply because absolutely everything is good.  It's clear that they only cook with top quality ingredients.  My faves:  Kakuni pork belly
column5: Kata's fresh catch ceviche and the Kobe beef.  We had a few sushi rolls as well and while they were delicious the other food was simply beyond delicious.  It's a bit pricey but the quality shines through.
